sentences.sContent: What are you trying to insinuate?

synos.tran: 暗示；使逐渐而巧妙地取得；使迂回地潜入

words.tran: 暗示；使…潜入；讨好（insinuate的ing形式）

trans.tranCn: 暗示；使逐渐而巧妙地取得；使迂回地潜入
trans.tranOther: to say something which seems to mean something unpleasant without saying it openly, especially suggesting that someone is being dishonest
